item.title: Blog: Shifting away from the R Community, into Python
item.description: Rladies. NCEAS. Bren. These are communities that helped me develop rigorous standards and unmatched skills in science computing through immersion in the R world. My underlying passion is in ocean science and conservation. R became my vessel for doing science more efficiently and creating new insights from exisiting stores and stores of scientific data that have been feverishly collected by any means that we can. I spent two years engaging, learning, troubleshooting through ggplot, shiny, stringr, datetimes, the list goes on.
